column4: can anyone help me with my wireless card? i cannot connect to any detected networks.  I am able to connect these networks from windows but no ubuntu.
i can see networks but not connect
I have a BCM4306 in my laptop. The restricted hardware recommended driver worked fine.
Are you using the right driver?
well it was working up to 2 days ago and I've never had a problem before
That's very strange. Have you upgraded distro version recently? I'm still on 9.04.
it was working even after i upgraded
Then I'm forced to assume it's a hardware issue if nothing has been changed.
but a hardware issue on both computers at the same time?
i would have concluded an ubuntu issue
maybe i'll try reinstalling my drivers
It's more likely, to me, that there would be a double hardware fault than that a lack of changes in software would cause different results.
Try that. See if it works.
but yet the same hardware works fine in windows on both machines
